name: R.B.I. Baseball 3
overview:
The best gets even better!

In the beginning, there was R.B.I. Baseball, the first baseball game for play on NES to use real players and their stats. Then came R.B.I. Baseball 2, giving hundreds of thousands of new fans the experience of playing pro ball at an even more realistic level. Now, you're holding the best ever: R.B.i. Baseball 3!

You get the latest 1990 stats of real players for all 26 teams, each with a roster of 24. What's more, you also get all the Division Champions from 1983 through 1989!

The awesome animation, graphics, music and sound effects plus the real stats and rules will have you believing you're actually playing in the big time. There's even Instant Replay, so you can relive the exciting plays during a game. Naturally, the best comes approved by the Major League Baseball Players Association!
